file_content.text: You act more like a bodyguard than an assassin. Is that your primary function?
Confirmation: It is a very difficult task indeed. That I have kept masters Beniko and Vortena alive despite their high-risk activities is my greatest achievement.
The two of them seem close.
Deflection: I am not programmed to assess or discuss the emotional matters of meatbags under my protection.
These creatures are hardly cunning. Their usual prey clearly doesn't offer much challenge.
Yeah... clearing these things out? Very easy... easiest thing ever....
I had to eject a few non-essential parts while we were circling to find a landing site. They're probably our best shot at finding spare components that actually work.
I'd be surprised if any of them could be used in such an old ship.
They'll work--just you wait and see.
